name: Vietnam Motorbike Tour from Hanoi to Saigon on Ho Chi Minh trail & Along the Coast
description: This amazing Vietnam motorbike tour is the most perfect way to ride from Hanoi to Saigon via Ho Chi Minh Trail and southern coastline via Mai Chau, Tan Ky, Phong Nha, Khe Sanh, Hue, Hoi An, Quy Nhon, Nha Trang, Mui Ne beach. Options to have more beach time is available.
